title: Boarder for Bronze!
body: I think we should give a boarder for bronze!

replies.body: we should give them the title ' challenged'
i think bronze should uninstall? how about you?

> [{quoted}](name=Homura Akemi,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cIoNrpEv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-04-09T14:39:54.060+0000)
>
> i think bronze should uninstall? how about you?

Get gud mate.. U dont see challengers stating that. Some had to go through bronze to get there.. Horrible attitude. U know you couldn't beat every current bronze at the moment. Does that mean u should uninstall?
why should bad players be rewarded?
You guys have honour ribbons. Shhh.
I think the border should be of gorillas, because we all know bronze players aren't human.. they're gorillas

> [{quoted}](name=Your Neighbour,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cIoNrpEv,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-04-09T13:33:15.562+0000)
>
> I think we should give a boarder for bronze!

They have one, it's draped in f*cks given and the colors are zero.
You get icons. That's enough considering it's the lowest one can possibly get.
